article_title: Subway To Add Calorie Information To All U.S. Menus
article_text:
Thank you for your interest in licensing Fortune content. Please find information on various licensing contacts below and choose the one that best suits your needs:

1. To license Fortune articles, excerpts, or headlines for republication in various media (including books, eBooks, film, web, newsletters, newspapers, magazines and others), please email syndication@timeinc.com.

2. To license a Fortune cover, order reprint or e-print copies of an article or cover, or license an accolade, please contact PARS International at www.timeincreprints.com.

3. To license text only photocopies of Fortunearticles as print or digital handouts in academic settings, or in academic coursepacks, please contact the Copyright Clearance Center at www.copyright.com

article_metadata.sailthru.author: John Kell

twitter.description: Subway will update its menu boards to feature calorie details for all menu items, a change that comes as health experts have called on the industry to give consumers more information about the food...
twitter.title: Subway to Add Calorie Information to All U.S. Menus

article_metadata.keywords: subway, restaurants, calories, fda, nutritional information, subay calorie information
article_metadata.sailthru.tags: calories, FDA, nutritional information, pubdesk, Restaurants, Subway
article_metadata.description: Fast food chain Subway is adding calorie information to all U.S. menus ahead of FDA mandate.
article_metadata.sailthru.title: Subway to Add Calorie Information to All U.S. Menus
article_metadata.news_keywords: Subway, restaurants, calories, FDA, nutritional information, subay calorie information
article_metadata.sailthru.description: Change comes ahead of FDA's 2017 mandate.

og.description: Change comes ahead of FDA's 2017 mandate.
og.title: Subway to add calorie information to all U.S. menus
